title: 论坛出问题了？为什么帖子无法编辑了
author: 快辰
txt_content:
如题测试发现只有这个帖子无法进行编辑，其他都可以http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-529520-1-1.html
点保存后会弹出网页无法访问，刷新后提示“抱歉，指定的主题不存在或已被删除或正在被审核"
不知是帖子数据被删还是什么。

replies.author: loloo
replies.txt_content: 用火狐浏览器即可，不信算了

replies.author: 快辰
replies.txt_content:

500 Internal Server Error

The server encountered an internal error or misconfiguration and was unable to complete your request. Sorry for the inconvenience.
 Please report this message and include the following information to us.
